hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Hurayrah: I went to Mount Tur and met Humayl ibn Basrah al-Ghifari, a companion of the Prophet ﷺ. He said: I heard the Prophet ﷺ saying: "The riding animals are not ridden to except to three masjids: the Sacred Masjid (Masjid al-Haram), my masjid (in Madinah), and the Masjid of Ilia (in Bait al-Maqdis)." And Musa ibn Ismail said: Narrated to us Abu Awanah who said: Narrated to us Abd al-Malik ibn Umayr from Umar ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn al-Harith who said: Abu Basrah al-Ghifari met Abu Hurayrah coming from Mount Tur. (I said: From where did you come?) It is similar to the above hadith.

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abdullah ibn Umar from the Prophet ﷺ regarding sneezing: The one who heard it is Ziyad ibn al-Rabi' al-Basri. Ali ibn Nasr said: He is the freed-slave (mawla) of Bani Judhaimah from Abd al-Qais. Narrated from him Nasr ibn Khuzaimah and Sukin ibn Abd al-Aziz. And Sukin attributed him (with a different nisba), saying: al-Hadrami ibn Ajlan.

hadiths.english_translation: Biographical note: Heard from Said ibn al-Masib. And Mughaytah al-Auza'i, whom Harb ibn Shaddad attributed (to someone), from Yahya ibn Abi Kathir. And al-Dustuwai said: Hadrami ibn Ishaq. And it is an error. Al-Nadhr ibn Muhammad said: Narrated to us Ikrimah ibn Ammar, said: Narrated to us al-Hadrami ibn Lahiq, and he was a jurist (faqih), and I went with him in the year 100 AH to Makkah.
